guidelines:
Translate 'Smart Signal' in English as 'Slim Signaal' in Dutch and vice versa.
Your previous translation was 'Het gebruik van Slim Signaal verbetert mijn prestaties op mijn werk.'. 
            This was backtranslated to 'The use of Smart Signal improves my work performance.'.
            Our expert evaluators have determined that the original and the backtranslation only have a cosine similarity of 0.98.
            Please improve your current translation based on this information.
